about_the_game:
Explore the silent story of Duality, a world in which reality has been split into two dimensions. Each level has been beautifully designed with extreme challenge in mind. Will you be able to uncover the secrets that each new challenge holds?

Experience Like No Other

  • Unique Gameplay: Dimension-based puzzles
  • Amazing challenges: Created from diverse gameplay elements
  • Immersed Environment: A first-person perspective allows you to feel like you're really a part of this interesting and immersive crafted world
  • Done for the love of it: The first project ever done by Essency Studios, made for the love of the game and the gamers.

The answer to every level may not always come easy, but isn't that what makes these so fun?

name: Duality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Approximately 50 user IQ
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-6600K or Ryzen 5 1500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX-970 or Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 160 user IQ or two seasons of watchtime in Rick and Morty

reviews:
“The game is really atmospheric and challenging, I had a lot of fun”
9/10 – Blake Gillman

“Duality, a puzzle game, that makes you think.”
8.5/10 – Der Genoße

“Feels like a passion project inspired by the mind bending games portal and monument valley.”
9/10 – BlitzBlaze
